name: IT201 Sprint02
description: For sprint 2, I improved on my sprint 1 project by adding features so that the user can delete painted strokes with input/time based solution. Also, the size, glow and opacity can now be modified via sliders on the UI. I modeled a 3D clock which follows the system time, and allowed the user to interact with the clock's hour hand and AM/PM toggle to change the time of day completely and compliment the user's painting experience. Lastly I added a feature that allows the user to toggle rotation of the paint objects using the UI.
